snippet.title: Fusion - Demo Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Fusion, a scifi third-person shooter with the survival horror elements. Fight to survival in the underground science station

Download demo here: https://red-mountain-games.itch.io/fusion

Follow us on:
https://www.patreon.com/RedMountainGames
https://twitter.com/RedMountainGame
https://www.instagram.com/red_mountain_games/ 

#survivalhorror #indiegamedev #ue4
